title: Michael Johnson (fighter)
summary: Michael Julian Johnson[1] (born June 4, 1986) is an American professional mixed martial artist. Johnson currently fights in the Lightweight division for the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). A professional MMA competitor since 2008, Johnson mostly competed in his regional circuit, before signing onto the Ultimate Fighting Championship to appear on The Ultimate Fighter: Team GSP vs. Team Koscheck, in which he was the runner-up.[4] Johnson is known for his formidable boxing and handspeed, and holds victories over the likes of Dustin Poirier, Edson Barboza and Tony Ferguson.
